title: Looking For: T206 Cobb, Cy Young, Walter Johnson Portraits - will trade for equiptmen
author: antiquebaseballuniforms

posts.post_title: Looking For: T206 Cobb, Cy Young, Walter Johnson Portraits - will trade for equiptmen
posts.post_content:
Looking to build a HOF set of graded (preferably SGC) t206 cards mostly portraits. I have tons of antique uniforms and equipment from 1900 to 1920s. I’m selling off a lot of my stuff to buy these cards and would like to trade instead. 

If you are interested please let me know. There’s something about putting on an old glove or holding an old cap and jersey like the ones pictured in the cards. 

I have many listings on eBay: [url]https://www.ebay.com/usr/vintagebaseballbats[/url]

I also just posted here on net54 a 1930s Hillerich and Bradsby monster 42 in store window display bat. 

Let me know if interested. 

Thanks 
Mark
